name: The Rivington Chair
description: The Rivington Chair is a contemporary addition to any dining room or living space. Its feminine hues, subtly curved back, and legs finished in a tinted beech, which taper gently to create an unmistakably modern silhouette, making it one of the more elegant chairs in the collection. As with other DAVIDSON chairs the Rivington is fully customisable, this glamorous chair can be upholstered in a fabric or leather of your choice, and the beech legs can be tinted to match a room scheme, making this chair perfect for both contemporary and traditional interiors.
